marklogic.body:
I'm not sure I like DeJesus leading Off.....I don't think his average and OBP will be all that good......I also think Castro should move up to 1st or 2nd.....He seems to press when he's hitting 3rd..If you move Castro up I would move the rest of the line-up up one Spot. Put DeJesus between Stewart and Soto......I don't like Soto hitting 8th but that seems to be the only Spot left. If you put Barney and Castro 1st and 2nd and Soto 3rd (with his power and this being his year,even) he might do well their, and then you put DeJesus 8th.....If everybody performs up to their ability this could possible be a decent year.....The pitching looks pretty good.
On paper doesn't mean much.....On the field is what counts..........LETS GO CUBS!!!!!!!!!!!!
